rules.natural: If the mobile app sends a notification, then if the temperature sensor triggers an alert, smart monitoring is not active

If automated response is initiated, then if alert system notifying the user does not lead to temperature sensor triggering an alert resulting in smart monitoring not being active, then manual intervention is not required
If emergency protocol is activated, then automated response is initiated
If battery backup is adequate, then if emergency cooling is engaged, the refrigeration system is not operational
Either battery backup is adequate or solar power is available
If solar power is available, then if emergency cooling is engaged, the refrigeration system is not operational
If local server remains operational, then cloud backup is accessible
If offline mode becomes active, then if internet connection becomes unstable, the food item becomes contaminated
If power outage occurs, then if internet connection becomes unstable, the food item becomes contaminated
If primary router is functioning, then local server remains operational
Either primary router is functioning or mesh network becomes active
If mesh network becomes active, then peer-to-peer communication is established
If peer-to-peer communication is established, then offline mode becomes active
If admin authorization is granted, then if power outage not occurring does not lead to manual override being possible, system override is executed
Either admin authorization is granted or emergency authorization becomes active
If emergency authorization becomes active, then if power outage not occurring does not lead to manual override being possible, system override is executed
If backup generator becomes active, then the refrigeration system is not operational
Either temperature sensor triggers an alert or humidity sensor triggers an alert
If humidity sensor triggers an alert, then smart monitoring is not active
Either alert system notifies the user or mobile app sends a notification
If alert system notifying the user does not lead to temperature sensor triggering an alert resulting in smart monitoring not being active, then manual intervention is required
If power outage not occurring does not lead to backup generator becoming active, then food safety breach occurs
If power outage does not occur, then emergency cooling is engaged
If power outage does not occur, then refrigeration system remains operational
If power outage does not occur, then manual override is not possible
If internet connection becomes unstable, then smart monitoring remains active

(A10 → (A7 → ¬A6)).natural: If the mobile app sends a notification, then if the temperature sensor triggers an alert, smart monitoring is not active

(A12 → (¬(A9 → (A7 → ¬A6)) → ¬A11)).natural: If automated response is initiated, then if alert system notifying the user does not lead to temperature sensor triggering an alert resulting in smart monitoring not being active, then manual intervention is not required

(A13 → A12).natural: If emergency protocol is activated, then automated response is initiated

(A14 → ¬A3).natural: If emergency cooling is engaged, then the refrigeration system is not operational

(A15 → (A14 → ¬A3)).natural: If battery backup is adequate, then if emergency cooling is engaged, the refrigeration system is not operational

(A15 ∨ A16).natural: Either battery backup is adequate or solar power is available

(A16 → (A14 → ¬A3)).natural: If solar power is available, then if emergency cooling is engaged, the refrigeration system is not operational

(A17 ∨ (¬G → A1)).natural: Either cloud backup is accessible or if internet connection becomes unstable, the food item becomes contaminated

(A18 → A17).natural: If local server remains operational, then cloud backup is accessible

(A18 ∨ A19).natural: Either local server remains operational or offline mode becomes active

(A19 → (¬G → A1)).natural: If offline mode becomes active, then if internet connection becomes unstable, the food item becomes contaminated

(A2 → (¬G → A1)).natural: If power outage occurs, then if internet connection becomes unstable, the food item becomes contaminated

(A20 → A18).natural: If primary router is functioning, then local server remains operational

(A20 ∨ A21).natural: Either primary router is functioning or mesh network becomes active

(A21 → A19).natural: If mesh network becomes active, then offline mode becomes active

(A21 → A22).natural: If mesh network becomes active, then peer-to-peer communication is established

(A22 → A19).natural: If peer-to-peer communication is established, then offline mode becomes active

(A25 → (¬(¬A2 → A23) → A24)).natural: If admin authorization is granted, then if power outage not occurring does not lead to manual override being possible, system override is executed

(A26 → (¬(¬A2 → A23) → A24)).natural: If emergency authorization becomes active, then if power outage not occurring does not lead to manual override being possible, system override is executed

(A4 → ¬A3).natural: If backup generator becomes active, then the refrigeration system is not operational
